EmailTemplate.description: Auto-response email for feedback submission via email/web
EmailTemplate.name: CTP Email Template for submitting feedback via email/web
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been recieved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for submitting your feedback. Your feedback will help us ensure the success of the NSW CTP scheme.
Our CTP Assist team will review the issues you have raised. If you have chosen to be contacted we will provide you with a response within two working days.
If you need help If you have any questions please contact CTP Assist on 1300 656 919.
Please do not reply on this email, if you have any enquiries please send your email to CTPassist@sira.nsw.gov.au
Kind regards CTP Assist State Insurance Regulatory Authority p 1300 656 919 www.sira.nsw.gov.au
{!Case.Thread_Id}
